title: SQL Server 2008 Real World with Spatial Data
eventShortDescription: ​Description: In this presentation Adam Cogan will demonstrate a real world web mapping application using SQL 2008 spatial capabilities and show you how to build location enabled application and services. Adam will also show a few gotchas in querying spatial data and tips on indexing to get the best performance for your spatial data.

Adam will also show a few gotchas in querying spatial data and tips on indexing to get the best performance for your spatial data.
description:
​

Description:

 In this presentation Adam Cogan will demonstrate a real world web mapping application using SQL 2008 spatial capabilities and show you how to build location enabled application and services. Adam will also show a few gotchas in querying spatial data and tips on indexing to get the best performance for your spatial data.
